title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & embedding interfaces as first-class LangChain components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that talks to any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting, managing models and history, powered by the Ollama API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & horizontal-scaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image (CPU & CUDA) plus compose files for quick local or server deployment.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama for generation and sentence-transformers for retrieval.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use any Ollama model as a Generator or Ranker node.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that swaps between local Ollama models with a sidebar selector.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (text generation, chat, embeddings).

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embedding endpoints plus admin UI for model management.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible routes on top of Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-ruby
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization, continuation and Q&A to your vault.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models across a GPU cluster with autoscaling and batching.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama with one-liners.
